short_summary: Reqhirer les prestations de location, de blanchisserie et de livraison
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has a requirement for garment rental, laundry and delivery services for a variety of protective garments used in laboratory, workshop and meat processing and slaughter establishments.
full_summary:
_____________________
### Tender Notice

#### Title
Western Area Laundry Services

#### Reference
cb-8806-10565856

#### Solicitation Number
2023-00009/B

#### Publication Date
2023-09-06

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-10-05T16:00:00

#### Amendment Date
2023-10-05

#### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-11-01

#### Expected Contract End Date
2024-09-30 (with options to extend for 3 additional years)

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Classification Code (UNSPSC)
91111500 - Laundry Services

#### Trade Agreements
CPTPP, CUFTA, CPFTA, C-ColFTA, CPanFTA, CETA, CKFTA, CFTA

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

#### Description
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking a contractor to provide garment rental, laundry, and delivery services for a variety of protective garments used in laboratory, workshop, and meat processing and slaughter establishments. This procurement is conditionally set aside under the Federal Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).

#### Security Clearance
No security clearance is required.

#### Contact Information
Peter Vinh
Email: [peter.vinh@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:peter.vinh@inspection.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 573-4194
Address: 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Y9, Canada.

#### Documents
Associated documents are available for download from the Canada Buy Service website.
_____________________
